DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the safety and effectiveness of the use of NMB's percutaneous transluminal angioplasty (PTA) Balloon.
DOC.brief_title: Study of NMB (Company's Name) Drug Ejecting Balloon for Arteriovenous Fistulae
DOC.criteria: patients 18 years and older Patients with arteriovenous fistula with obstructive lesion Patient who is willing and able to sign a written informed consent age < 18 female with child bearing potential Previous participation in another study with any investigational drug or device within the past 30 days Life expectancy of less than 12 months
